text: Does anyone know if <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/updates-to-enumeration-properties-in-custom-quotes-and-how-to-fetch-labels-and-internal-values|this change> was also applied to enum properties outside of Custom quote templates? I'm trying to show the label of a Deal dropdown property, instead of the internal value, on a CMS page, but no luck using the syntax displayed here.
